title: Embroidery, 18th century
medium:
Medium: satin, silk, metallic threads
Technique: embroidered, couched
description: Dark blue satin embroidered and couched with stylized rolling wave design with curling crests; dots, grouped pearls (?), within the waves. In greens, blues, and white, outlined and accented with gold. Lined with salmon pink satin now faded. Five satin button-loops on each band and five small round hollow brass buttons.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery, 18th century. Medium: satin, silk, metallic threads
Technique: embroidered, couched. 1955-67-5-b.
